languages.text: Все на корабле знали о связи между Кибеллой и ее Домин, но знали также, что связи этой не суждено было стать чем-то большим. Скрепив сердце, Кибелла отдалилась от Лорд-капитана, довольствуясь лишь ролью стражницы свое{mf|го|й} возлюбленн{mf|ого|ой}, храня чувство в своем сердце и не дозволяя себе более. Пусть боль от сего решения и была велика, она не видела иного пути, по которому могла провести ее стезя Кровавой паутины.
languages.translation_comment:
Нет тру романса
Нет коррапт романса

Нет тру романса
Нет коррапт романса

languages.text: Everyone on the ship knew about the liaison between Kibellah and her Domin, but they also knew it would never turn into anything greater. Reluctantly, Kibellah grew distant from the Lord Captain, content with her role as her beloved's bodyguard and keeping her feelings confined to her own heart. As painful as that decision was, she saw no other path that the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web could lead her down.
languages.original_text: Все на корабле знали о связи между Кибеллой и ее Домин, но знали также, что связи этой не суждено было стать чем-то большим. Скрепив сердце, Кибелла отдалилась от Лорд-капитана, довольствуясь лишь ролью стражницы свое{mf|го|й} возлюбленн{mf|ого|ой}, храня чувство в своем сердце и не дозволяя себе более. Пусть боль от сего решения и была велика, она не видела иного пути, по которому могла провести ее стезя Кровавой паутины.

traits.locale_text: Everyone on the ship knew about the liaison between Kibellah and her Domin, but they also knew it would never turn into anything greater. Reluctantly, Kibellah grew distant from the Lord Captain, content with her role as her beloved's bodyguard and keeping her feelings confined to her own heart. As painful as that decision was, she saw no other path that the tenets of the Bloodspun Web could lead her down.

languages.text: Alle auf dem Schiff wussten von Kibellahs Verhältnis mit {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Domin, aber sie wussten auch, dass niemals mehr daraus werden würde. Kibellah entfernte sich widerwillig vom Lord Captain, war aber mit ihrer Rolle als Leibwächterin zufrieden und behielt ihre eigenen Gefühle für sich. Die Entscheidung war zwar schmerzlich, aber sie sah keinen anderen Weg, auf den sie die Lehren des Blutgesponnenen Netzes führen konnten.
languages.original_text: Everyone on the ship knew about the liaison between Kibellah and her Domin, but they also knew it would never turn into anything greater. Reluctantly, Kibellah grew distant from the Lord Captain, content with her role as her beloved's bodyguard and keeping her feelings confined to her own heart. As painful as that decision was, she saw no other path that the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web could lead her down.

traits.locale_text: Alle auf dem Schiff wussten von Kibellahs Verhältnis mit {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Domin, aber sie wussten auch, dass niemals mehr daraus werden würde. Kibellah entfernte sich widerwillig vom Lord Captain, war aber mit ihrer Rolle als Leibwächterin zufrieden und behielt ihre eigenen Gefühle für sich. Die Entscheidung war zwar schmerzlich, aber sie sah keinen anderen Weg, auf den sie die Lehren des Blutgesponnenen Netzes führen konnten.

languages.text: Si tout le monde à bord du vaisseau avait connaissance de la liaison qu'entretenaient Kibellah et {mf|son|sa} Domin, tous savaient aussi que l'affaire en resterait là. La mort dans l'âme, Kibellah prit ses distances avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, se contentant de lui servir de garde du corps et de confiner ses tendres sentiments dans son propre cœur. Si douloureuse cette décision fût-elle, elle n'entrevoyait pas d'autre solution compatible avec préceptes de la Toile de Sang.
languages.original_text: Everyone on the ship knew about the liaison between Kibellah and her Domin, but they also knew it would never turn into anything greater. Reluctantly, Kibellah grew distant from the Lord Captain, content with her role as her beloved's bodyguard and keeping her feelings confined to her own heart. As painful as that decision was, she saw no other path that the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web could lead her down.

traits.locale_text: Si tout le monde à bord du vaisseau avait connaissance de la liaison qu'entretenaient Kibellah et {mf|son|sa} Domin, tous savaient aussi que l'affaire en resterait là. La mort dans l'âme, Kibellah prit ses distances avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, se contentant de lui servir de garde du corps et de confiner ses tendres sentiments dans son propre cœur. Si douloureuse cette décision fût-elle, elle n'entrevoyait pas d'autre solution compatible avec préceptes de la Toile de Sang.

languages.text: Todo el mundo en la nave sabía de la relación entre Kibellah y su Domin, pero también sabían que nunca iría más allá. A regañadientes, Kibellah se distanció de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, satisfecha con su papel de guardaespaldas de su amad{mf|o|a} y con encerrar sus sentimientos en lo más hondo de su corazón. Era una decisión dolorosa, pero era la única que los preceptos de la Red Sanguinolenta le dejaban ver.
languages.original_text: Everyone on the ship knew about the liaison between Kibellah and her Domin, but they also knew it would never turn into anything greater. Reluctantly, Kibellah grew distant from the Lord Captain, content with her role as her beloved's bodyguard and keeping her feelings confined to her own heart. As painful as that decision was, she saw no other path that the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web could lead her down.

traits.locale_text: Todo el mundo en la nave sabía de la relación entre Kibellah y su Domin, pero también sabían que nunca iría más allá. A regañadientes, Kibellah se distanció de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, satisfecha con su papel de guardaespaldas de su amad{mf|o|a} y con encerrar sus sentimientos en lo más hondo de su corazón. Era una decisión dolorosa, pero era la única que los preceptos de la Red Sanguinolenta le dejaban ver.

languages.text: 船内の誰もがキベラとドミンの関係を知っていたが、それ以上の関係にならないことも知っていた。キベラはやむなくロード・キャプテンと距離を置くようになり、最愛の人のボディーガードとしての役割に満足して自分の感情を胸に秘めた。その決断は苦しいものだったが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの教義が導く道は他になかった。
languages.original_text: Everyone on the ship knew about the liaison between Kibellah and her Domin, but they also knew it would never turn into anything greater. Reluctantly, Kibellah grew distant from the Lord Captain, content with her role as her beloved's bodyguard and keeping her feelings confined to her own heart. As painful as that decision was, she saw no other path that the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web could lead her down.

traits.locale_text: 船内の誰もがキベラとドミンの関係を知っていたが、それ以上の関係にならないことも知っていた。キベラはやむなくロード・キャプテンと距離を置くようになり、最愛の人のボディーガードとしての役割に満足して自分の感情を胸に秘めた。その決断は苦しいものだったが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの教義が導く道は他になかった。

languages.text: 船上的每个人都清楚绮贝菈与她的秘者之间的关系，但所有人也很清楚，他们的关系只能止步于此。尽管绮贝菈很不情愿，但还是与行商浪人渐行渐远。她满足于自己身为爱人、保镖的角色，将自己的感情牢牢锁在心里。尽管这个决定很痛苦，但除此之外，她找不到织血罗网的信条为她指引的其他道路。
languages.original_text: Everyone on the ship knew about the liaison between Kibellah and her Domin, but they also knew it would never turn into anything greater. Reluctantly, Kibellah grew distant from the Lord Captain, content with her role as her beloved's bodyguard and keeping her feelings confined to her own heart. As painful as that decision was, she saw no other path that the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web could lead her down.

traits.locale_text: 船上的每个人都清楚绮贝菈与她的秘者之间的关系，但所有人也很清楚，他们的关系只能止步于此。尽管绮贝菈很不情愿，但还是与行商浪人渐行渐远。她满足于自己身为爱人、保镖的角色，将自己的感情牢牢锁在心里。尽管这个决定很痛苦，但除此之外，她找不到织血罗网的信条为她指引的其他道路。

languages.text: Gemideki herkes, Kibellah ile Domin arasındaki gizli ilişkiden haberdardı. Ancak bu ilişkinin daha ciddi bir yere varmayacağını da biliyorlardı. Kibellah, isteksizce de olsa Lord Kaptan'ın kıymetli koruması rolünden memnun ve duygularını yüreğinde muhafaza eder bir hâlde ondan uzaklaştı. Bu karar ne kadar acı verirse versin, Kanipi Ağı'nın İlkeleri'nin ona kılavuzluk edeceği başka hiçbir yol görememişti.
languages.original_text: Everyone on the ship knew about the liaison between Kibellah and her Domin, but they also knew it would never turn into anything greater. Reluctantly, Kibellah grew distant from the Lord Captain, content with her role as her beloved's bodyguard and keeping her feelings confined to her own heart. As painful as that decision was, she saw no other path that the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web could lead her down.
